name: Coindice Simulator
description:
Throw coins and dices like never before.
Throw dices like never before and save the results to view them later.
The hand is making manual throwing possible.

Features
  • Throw up to 10 throwables at once
  • Document your results in .txt files
  • View documented results
  • 12 different throwables
  • Optional HUD showing results
  • Optional hand


Throwables
  • Coin
  • Special Coin
  • D6 Dice
  • D8 Dice
  • D10 Dice
  • D12 Dice
  • D16 Dice
  • D20 Dice
  • D6 Special Dice
  • D? Custom Dice
  • D2 Doubling Dice
  • D? Custom Doubling Dice
